channel.title: Amazon on Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon on Blog

item.title: Amazon Polly TTS connector
item.description: Image source: Interactive Powers Interactive Powers introduces 27 Languages & 60+ additional Text-to-Speech voices with Amazon Polly Integration About Amazon… Amazon Polly is a Text-to-Speech (TTS) service that uses advanced deep learning technologies to synthesize speech that sounds like a human voice. It’s part of the voice of Alexa and can do much more for your business too. Amazon has arround 60 voices across 30 languages and variants.
